title: I create, design, concept, scribble, plan and develop interfaces for humans.  Since 2001.
text: And this website is my online playground, my about me site and my own tiny corner within the internet. It is build with my own static site boilerplate, which utilize Eleventy, Bootstrap 5, npm, Gulp and some nice pre and post processing scripts. It is hosted on Netlify and is deployed via GitHub. Yeah I know, it´s a total overkill for a tiny one pager like this. But as I said: It is my personal playground...
